Class Player

java.lang.Object
  Player

public class Player
extends java.lang.Object

The Player class stores fields that personalise the player (name), give them a score and determine which is the active one in the game; apart from accessor and mutator methods it also allows a player to roll the die and mark a chosen dice as used.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Mikolaj Gackowski
